conversation.content: I want comfortable, durable, and versatile shorts suitable for everyday wear and outdoor activities. within my expected price range: [19.92, 27.88]

Based on your budget range, I recommend the Champion Men's Shorts, Everyday Shorts, Lightweight Long Shorts for Men (Reg. Or Big & Tall) ($15.0). These shorts offer comfort and quality for everyday wear and outdoor activities. If you're interested, I also have a potentially purchasable candidate: <Champion Men's Shorts, Everyday Shorts, Lightweight Long Shorts for Men (Reg. Or Big & Tall)> (B0C5YY1Y34) available.
